diag.dialogue: Can you tell me which way to go?
Tch. Do I look like a guide to you, Orc boy?
...Despite the fact that I'm more likely to be a traitor than a guide to you
Can you shut up and tell me where I'm at?
Tch. You are in front of me in a forest. Happy now?
Can you just give me directions to the nearest city? You clearly don't want a long conversation
